entry.title: subhadeeproy3902/mvpblocks
entry.summary:
MVPBlocks is an open-source component library for developers to copy, customize, and launch MVPs lightning-fastâ€”no installations, just pure productivity.

ğŸ§± MVPBlocks

The Ultimate Open Source Component Library for MVPs.
Copy, paste, customizeâ€”and launch your idea faster than ever.

âš¡ What is MVPBlocks?

MVPBlocks is a fully open-source, developer-first component library built using Next Js and TailwindCSS, designed to help you launch your MVPs in record time. No bloated packages, no unnecessary installsâ€”just clean, copyable code to plug right into your next big thing.

Whether you're building a SaaS dashboard, a landing page, or a personal portfolioâ€”MVPBlocks offers a curated set of reusable blocks designed to work beautifully right out of the box.

ğŸ’ What We Provide

We donâ€™t just give you UI blocksâ€”we give you freedom to build without friction. Here's what you get with MVPBlocks:

  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Developer-Friendly
    Tailored for developers to create and iterate fast, with minimal overhead and maximum flexibility.

  • ğŸ”§ CLI Support
    Seamlessly integrate MVPBlocks into your workflow using our smart CLI support, optimized for speed and efficiency.

  • ğŸ¨ Easily Customisable
    Every block is built to be editable. From layout to logic, style to structureâ€”make it your own.

  • ğŸš€ v0 Support
    Even at version zero, you can launch fast with confidence. Ideal for MVPs, prototypes, and weekend hacks.

  • ğŸ“š Fully Functional Docs Understanding
    Comprehensive documentation and inline guides help you quickly understand how to use, modify, or contribute components.

  • ğŸ–¥ï¸ Multi Viewport
    Preview and copy blocks optimized for every screen sizeâ€”from mobile to ultra-wide monitors.

  • ğŸ§© Easy-to-Use Interface
    Our web UI is intuitive, clean, and minimal. Preview, click, copy. Thatâ€™s it.

  • ğŸ’¥ Add Yours!
    Add your own blocks to the ecosystem. No setup required. Just submit a PR and let the world use your work.

âœ¨ Want to Contribute?

We LOVE contributions. And we believe in equalityâ€”if you contribute a block, youâ€™ll be credited as the author, always.

  • No need for perfect formattingâ€”weâ€™ll clean it up.
  • You can even submit raw component files.
  • Mobile responsiveness and TailwindCSS are all we ask.
  • Submitting a block? Follow this guide:

ğŸ”— Add Your Own Block â†’

ğŸŒ Explore MVPBlocks

Head over to blocks.mvp-subha.me to:

  • ğŸ” Browse through 100+ unique blocks
  • ğŸ¯ Filter by category (Auth, Dashboard, Hero, Pricing, and more)
  • ğŸ“‹ Copy with a single click
  • ğŸ“˜ Read full documentation
  • ğŸš€ Contribute your own

ğŸ’¬ Join the Community

Whether you have questions, ideas, or just wanna hang outâ€”come join us!

  • ğŸ™ GitHub Discussions
  • ğŸ“¥ Submit a Pull Request
  • ğŸš¨ Report an Issue

ğŸ“œ Terms and Conditions

  • You can freely use, modify, and copy blocks from MVPBlocks.
  • If you contribute a block, you retain authorship. We believe in equality and attribution.
  • Please donâ€™t use MVPBlocks content for piracy or unethical purposes.
  • No need to contact us for using blocksâ€”just give credit if possible.
  • Refer to our full Terms & Conditions page for more.

ğŸ›¡ï¸ License

MVPBlocks is released under the BSD 3-Clause License.
Use it commercially, personally, and freely. Just donâ€™t resell components as-is.

ğŸŒŸ Open Source With â¤ï¸

MVPBlocks is proudly open source and built by passionate developers.
If you find it helpful:

  • â­ Star the repo to show your support
  • ğŸ›  Contribute a block, idea, or fix
  • ğŸ Raise an issue if somethingâ€™s broken

Together, letâ€™s build a better internetâ€”one block at a time.

ğŸ’ª Thanks to all Contributors

Thanks to all contributors for helping this project grow! ğŸ»

Made with â¤ï¸ by Subhadeep Roy

entry.title: haydenbleasel/kibo
entry.summary:
A custom registry of composable, accessible and open source shadcn/ui components.

Kibo UI

Overview

Kibo UI is a custom registry of composable, accessible and open source components designed for use with shadcn/ui. The components use the shadcn/ui CSS variables and are designed to work neatly with the existing primitives.

Much like the core shadcn/ui primitives, the Kibo UI components are effectively a collection of building blocks that can be used to create more complex components. They encompass a wide range of use-cases and are designed to reduce boilerplate code without sacrificing flexibility and responsive design.

While shadcn/ui focuses on wrapping primitives from Radix UI, Kibo UI is designed to be a more comprehensive library of components that can be used to build more complex applications. The components wrap more complex logic from various headless libraries to provide a more seamless experience.

Installation

Read the docs

Contributors

Made with contrib.rocks.

Sponsors

Thank you to all our sponsors!

CodeRabbit

CodeRabbit helps you cut code review time & bugs in half. Supercharge your entire team with AI-driven contextual feedback. Supports all languages!
